pages.description: This story begins beside a busy road.
pages.title: This story begins beside.
pages.content: It had been years since I’d been here, and while I remembered the place fondly, I was still left with a strange feeling of guilt for my own neglect of the place. Why had it been so long since I’d returned? The buildings themselves stared at me like a disapproving relative suspicious of my sudden arrival. The journey had not been a long one, but it had been uncomfortable, and hot, and I was eager to leave the car and begin my business. I wasn’t to be here long, and saw no reason for delay.
